description.displayText:
Ugoada responded to my job I posted . I didn't respond to her message because I had tentatively decided on hiring someone else already but they hadn't started the job yet. She then sent me a second rude nasty message saying "Did we do the job interview on Wednesday? Oh sorry I didn't meet with your expectation. "  
I don't understand the need or reason for her to send me a message like that. With that attitude I'm glad I never considered hiring her.
description.originalText:
Ugoada responded to my job I posted . I didn't respond to her message because I had tentatively decided on hiring someone else already but they hadn't started the job yet. She then sent me a second rude nasty message saying "Did we do the job interview on Wednesday? Oh sorry I didn't meet with your expectation. "  
I don't understand the need or reason for her to send me a message like that. With that attitude I'm glad I never considered hiring her.
